game.name: HeartQuest: The Feelings Adventure
game.description: An interactive story game for children to learn emotional intelligence and empathy.

levels.title: The Lonely Playground
levels.scenario: Alex is standing alone while other kids play tag. No one invited Alex.

choices.feedback: Great job! Including others makes everyone happy.
Alex might feel sad. It's better to include others.
That hurts feelings. Kindness is always better.

levels.feeling_question: How do you think Alex feels?

levels.title: The Broken Toy
levels.scenario: Sam drops his favorite toy car and it breaks. He starts to cry.

choices.feedback: Helping friends when they are sad is very kind.
Toys can be special. It's okay to be sad when they break.
Sam needs a friend right now.

levels.feeling_question: How do you think Sam feels?

levels.title: The Lunch Table
levels.scenario: Taylor has no one to sit with at lunch. The table is full.

choices.feedback: Making space for friends is a wonderful way to show you care.
That's not kind. Everyone needs a place to sit.
Ignoring someone can make them feel invisible.

levels.feeling_question: How do you think Taylor feels?
